00011 bool compileFile(MavenCompiler* c, string file, int mode) {
00012         // prepare
00013         ifstream infile;
00014         infile.open(file.c_str());
00015         if(!infile.is_open())
00016                 return false;
00017 
00018         // remeber position
00019         string cFile = c->currentFile;
00020         string cNamespace = c->currentNamespace;
00021         int cLine = ++c->lineNumber;
00022         ++c->totalFiles;
00023         c->currentFile = file;
00024         
00025         // read whole file
00026         string wholeFile = "";
00027         while(!infile.eof())
00028                 wholeFile += infile.get();
00029         infile.close();
00030         
00031         bool r = compileBlock(c, "", wholeFile, mode);
00032         
00033         // restore position
00034         resetCurrent(c, cFile, cNamespace, cLine);
00035         
00036         return r;
00037 }
